pullrequest.title: Write to disk from a background thread in log recorder

content.raw: I'm going to have to revert this one because it leads to a race condition if a `log::Recorder` object is created and destroyed immediately. This is causing a test failure on pipelines. As the [documentation](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/428/write-to-disk-from-a-background-thread-in/diff?w=1#Llog/src/Recorder.ccT135) states, the flag is meant to indicate that the thread is starting or has started, so it's okay for it to be true before the thread has actually started.
